title.rendered: New Glacier European Ledge is refined for the modern home

content.rendered:
Designer profile updated with new color to create beautiful and modern spaces

SAN DIEGO, CA – Masonry techniques of the past have been refined for today’s home in Eldorado Stone’s newest architectural stone veneer profile color, Glacier European Ledge. With modern sophistication at the forefront, the light accents of the stone veneer profile blend the line between old-world stonework and contemporary design in any exterior or interior environment.

Sleek, spacious and simple all define the 21st century home with a neutral color palette. These elements are represented in the newest addition to the European Ledge stone veneer. The Glacier color blends with any design to create illusions of larger spaces.

“The polished look of the Glacier color in European Ledge has combined classic masonry with a stylish aesthetic to bring homeowners and designers more options,” said Ramsay Hawfield, Vice President of Marketing and Product Development at Eldorado Stone. “Glacier European Ledge was inspired by a modern colorist and voted on by builders, developers, architects and other industry professionals. The new color is sure to instantly inspire beautiful installations.”

TWEET THIS: New @EldoradoStone Glacier European Ledge #StoneVeneer brings a contemporary color to classic masonry. http://ctt.ec/uTr5N

The hand-painted precision allows this split-face travertine to evoke a unique balance of weather-worn surface contours and precision-cut stone. Indoor and outdoor installations of architectural stone veneer create stair-stepped edges to eliminate unsightly vertical joints, while the lightweight material allows for quick and easy installations for sustainable projects.

For more information about Eldorado Stone, please visit eldoradostone.com.

# # #

About Eldorado Stone
Eldorado Stone, LLC is headquartered in San Marcos, Calif. It is a subsidiary of Headwaters Incorporated (NYSE:HW), a world leader in creating value through innovative advancements in the utilization of natural resources. Eldorado Stone offers a full line of interior and exterior products that elevate architecture and design, including stone and brick veneer, fireplace surrounds, fire bowls and a full Eldorado Outdoor collection. The company currently operates manufacturing facilities in several states with regional distribution centers across the U.S. For more information and to view a gallery of beautiful installations, visit www.eldoradostone.com or call 1-800-925-1491 for a free catalog.
